main event: A UFO was sighted in Freeport, Michigan on September 23, 1950, between 0730 and 0745.
interesting points: The object was observed at an elevation of 240 degrees and was still visible at 0745., The observer has sighted objects like this before., The object was described as silver to red to yellow in color., The sighting was made with 10 power field glasses., There was a suggestion that the object might be a balloon or aircraft, but insufficient data was available for evaluation.
witness description: Male, 45 years old, steelworker, wears bifocals for work.
